review: Was not able to cast everything from you computer... Only able to cast app (Hulu/YouTube etc) or Google chrome cast related stuff.. Kinda weak ..
author: Phothong Sourivanh

review: For what I use it for I much prefer Fire TV
author: Seamus "Drunkin' Seamus"

review: Took awhile for me to set it up.  I don't know much about puters and such. but figured it out.
author: wayne peterson

review: The Chromecast hardware itself seems to work great. But I've yet to find a single app to work on my phone or either of my tablets that doesn't lose connection with it after just a few min. Then I have no control over what playing and can only unplug it. Not sure if this is a hardware or software issue.
author: J. Mills

review: I didn't like the quality it didn't mirror at 1080p
author: erwin rodriguez

review: Setting it up was not as easy as they want to to believe and the picture loses quality with Amazon Prime on wifi.  Probably would not buy again.
author: Meagan

review: Works well but it has a hard time with weaker wifi signals that my phone and ipad can easily pick up.
author: Steven Starwalt
